content: if you are loving the popularity of checkers right now then you re going to love this checkered bottle holder pattern you can make as many as you want in as many colors as you want water bottle carriers are great for anytime you want to be hands free but really want to keep your water with you please note that there is an ad-free pdf version of this pattern available for purchase in my ravelry store to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/checkered-bottle-holder-pattern-crochet/ materials 98 yards size 4 yarn in main color i used i love this cotton in warm blush 42 yards size 4 yarn in neutral color i used i love this cotton in ivory us h/ 5 0 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors sizing when completed at this gauge the bottle carrier should fit a typical 16 9 fl oz water bottle very loosely and a slightly larger bottle with a snug fit to resize the pattern simply add or remove a round from the base stitches used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet blo single_crochet back loop only double_crochet double_crochet
